short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate AI proposals and apply jobs in popular freelance platforms i.e. Upwork, Freelancer and Guru

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BidPacer is a powerful utility application that uses artificial intelligence to create tailored cover-letters and any job credentials, allowing users to apply for freelance jobs with just one click!
